parameters.name: ContainerFieldName
parameters.description:
The name of the container field. Valid values:

*   **clusterId**: the ID of the cluster

parameters.name: ContainerFieldValue
parameters.description: The value of the container field.

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the request source. Set the value to **sas**, which indicates that the request is sent from Security Center.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the alert type.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description:
The UUIDs of servers. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).

> You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~141932~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
